text: Gloria Jones (born October 19, 1945) is an American singer and songwriter. She recorded the 1965 song "Tainted Love". She also had other songs. On September 16, 1977, Jones was driving a car. Marc Bolan of the group T. Rex was a passenger. The car crashed and killed Bolan. Jones was born in Cincinnati, Ohio. She later moved to Los Angeles, California. ==References== Category:American singer-songwriters Category:Writers from Cincinnati Category:Singers from Cincinnati Category:1945 births Category:Living people
title: Gloria Jones
